name: Hell's Out
description:
The game

In Hell's Out you take control of Nico'J&rson, a demon, trying to escape from hell. But you need cooperation with your other side to survive the challenges ahead.

You can play alone, or with a friend, sharing the controls of Nico'J&rson to rule out the challenges and get the highest score!

Controls

W A S D or Left Thumbstick - Movement

Space bar or (X or A) - Jump

Shift or Left Trigger - Dash

Ctrl or Right Trigger - Crouch
